name: Cacao
description: Cacao takes the players into the exotic world of the “Fruit of the Gods.” Each is a tribal chief trying to lead his tribe to fame and wealth by growing and trading in cacao. At the end of the game, the player with the most gold wins.

name: Cacao: Chocolatl
description: Cacao – Chocolatl contains 4 expansion modules that may be integrated with the basic game of Cacao, individually or in any combination. The rules of the base game apply, except where noted by a module’s rules.

name: Cacao: Diamante
description: Caao: Diamante contains 4 expansion modules that can be integrated individually or in any combination into the Caao base game. In addition, these new modules can be combined with the modules from Caao: Choolatl in any way you desire. The “Big Game” variant makes it possible to play using all the modules from both expansions and all elements of the base game together. The rules of the base game apply, with the changes described below.
